text: وَلَوْ رَحِمْنَـٰهُمْ وَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرٍّ لَّلَجُّوا۟ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And even if We gave them mercy and removed what was upon them of affliction, they would persist in their transgression, wandering blindly.
translation.id.indonesian: Andaikata mereka Kami belas kasihani, dan Kami lenyapkan kemudharatan yang mereka alami, benar-benar mereka akan terus menerus terombang-ambing dalam keterlaluan mereka.
